II. Purpose of Addendum
Lutheran Social Services of Michigan will transfer their semi-independent living
program and Wayne County foster homes services from their Southfield location to a
satellite office in Detroit. The satellite office is located at 8145 E. Jefferson Avenue,
Detroit, MI 48214-2610.
III. Methodology
12/13/2012 Toured the Detroit Satellite office
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The Detroit Satellite office has a receptionist area, 2 foster care visit rooms,
computer lab set up for semi-independent living residents to use, conference and
meeting rooms, staff kitchen area and staff cubicles. The facility space is adequate.
The facility is also near a bus stop that semi-independent residents and parents can
use for transportation. There is limited parking available for vehicles in the parking
lot next to the building.
The Detroit satellite office will house two foster care/licensing supervisors, two
licensing workers, six foster care workers, one semi-independent living program
supervisor and three semi-independent living workers.
V. Recommendation
Lutheran Social Services of Michigan is approved to utilize the Detroit satellite office.
